Broken String Biosciences 与弗朗西斯·克里克研究所合作推进 ALS 研究合作扩大 DNA 断裂图谱技术的应用，并加深对神经退行性疾病肌萎缩侧索硬化症发展中基因组不稳定性的了解。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240507/Broken-String-Biosciences-and-the-Francis-Crick-Institute-collaborate-to-advance-ALS-research.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240507/Broken-String-Biosciences-and-the-Francis-Crick-Institute-collaborate-to-advance-ALS-research.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=9e1b3a1d-7df8-48ad-b1a9-62a98155cc97 Tue, 07 May 2024 08:16:00 -0400 Broken String Biosciences and the Francis Crick Institute collaborate to advance ALS research

研究表明，高度坚持地中海饮食可降低老年人的全身炎症高地中海饮食模式（MDP）依从性与低度全身炎症减少之间的关系。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240507/Study-shows-that-high-Mediterranean-dietary-adherence-lowers-systemic-inflammation-in-elders.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240507/Study-shows-that-high-Mediterranean-dietary-adherence-lowers-systemic-inflammation-in-elders.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=2631a9ff-5be2-4946-8848-79380c48b141 Tue, 07 May 2024 03:55:00 -0400 Study shows that high Mediterranean dietary adherence lowers systemic inflammation in elders
案例研究：大麻可能会减轻疼痛，但会加剧精神病！案例研究详细介绍了一名患有分裂情感障碍和纤维肌痛的 27 岁女性，她使用高效大麻来缓解疼痛，但出现了不良精神影响。为期一个月的降低游离谷氨酸的饮食改善了她的疼痛和心理健康，并让她戒掉了大麻，这凸显了大麻自我药疗治疗疼痛的风险。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240507/Case-study-Cannabis-might-dampen-the-pain-but-amplify-the-psychosis!.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240507/Case-study-Cannabis-might-dampen-the-pain-but-amplify-the-psychosis!.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=8156b37c-b8bc-4483-b7ca-330af70fede9 Tue, 07 May 2024 00:27:00 -0400 Case study: Cannabis might dampen the pain, but amplify the psychosis!
疫苗接种拯救生命 50 年：世卫组织的 EPI 拯救了 1.54 亿人的生命自 1974 年以来，世界卫生组织的扩大免疫计划 (EPI) 已避免了 1.54 亿人死亡，显着降低了全球婴儿死亡率，并因疫苗接种而贡献了 102 亿年的健康寿命。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240507/50-years-of-life saving-vaccinations-WHOs-EPI-saves-154-million-lives.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240507/50-years-of-life saving-vaccinations-WHOs-EPI-saves-154-million-lives.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=aea223b1-aab8-4eef-8788-7b42223aa270 Tue, 07 May 2024 00:03:00 -0400 50 years of lifesaving vaccinations: WHO's EPI saves 154 million lives
